content: XDS / CDA question for my CDA/XDS comrades: are you familiar with any use and coupling of externalDocuments and XDS associations in any XDS setups that uses this binding actively to group related documents?
are you asking about XDS associations mechanics? Or something else? You might want to ask on the #ihe stream too. Even wider audience on the xds implementers google group.

Some time ago, we published a profile for v2 MDM messages. This guide contains a mapping between v2 and CDA/v3 https://wiki.hl7.de/index.php?title=HL7v2-Profile_MDM-Nachrichten#Anhang_A:_Mapping_auf_HL7_V3 , and also a mapping of the v2 events to corresponding XDS transactions https://wiki.hl7.de/index.php?title=HL7v2-Profile_MDM-Nachrichten#Anhang_B:_Mapping_auf_IHE_XDS , the latter implies the codes for XDS document association.
